original: seyyathidaṁ—naccaṁ gītaṁ vāditaṁ pekkhaṁ akkhānaṁ pāṇissaraṁ vetāḷaṁ kumbhathūṇaṁ
analyzed: gītam vāditam pekkham akkhānam pāṇissaram vetāḷam kumbhathūṇa
corrected: seyyathidam naccam gītam vāditam pekkham akkhānam pāṇissaram vetāḷam kumbhathūṇam

original: seyyathidaṁ—aṭṭhapadaṁ dasapadaṁ ākāsaṁ parihārapathaṁ santikaṁ khalikaṁ ghaṭikaṁ
analyzed: ākāsam parihāra patham santikam khalikam ghaṭika
corrected: seyyathidam aṭṭhapadam dasapadam ākāsam parihāra patham santikam khalikam ghaṭikam

original: seyyathidaṁ—āsandiṁ pallaṅkaṁ gonakaṁ cittakaṁ paṭikaṁ paṭalikaṁ tūlikaṁ vikatikaṁ
analyzed: pallaṅkam gonakam cittakam paṭikam paṭalikam tūlikam vikatika
corrected: seyyathidam āsandim pallaṅkam gonakam cittakam paṭikam paṭalikam tūlikam vikatikam

original: seyyathidaṁ—na tvaṁ imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ ājānāsi, ahaṁ imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ ājānāmi,
analyzed: tvam imam dhamma vinayam ājānāsi aham imam dhamma vinayam ājānāmi
corrected: seyyathidaṁ na tvam imam dhamma vinayam ājānāsi aham imam dhamma vinayam ājānāmi

original: seyyathidaṁ—aṅgaṁ nimittaṁ uppātaṁ supinaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ mūsikacchinnaṁ aggihomaṁ dabbihomaṁ
analyzed: nimittam uppātam supinam lakkhaṇam mūsikacchinnam aggi homam dabbi homa
corrected: seyyathidam aṅgam nimittam uppātam supinam lakkhaṇam mūsikacchinnam aggi homam dabbi homam

original: mūsikavijjā sakuṇavijjā vāyasavijjā pakkajjhānaṁ saraparittāṇaṁ migacakkaṁ
analyzed: mūsika vijjā sakuṇa vijjā vāyasa vijjā
corrected: mūsika vijjā sakuṇa vijjā vāyasa vijjā pakkajjhānaṁ saraparittāṇaṁ migacakkaṁ

original: seyyathidaṁ—raññaṁ niyyānaṁ bhavissati, raññaṁ aniyyānaṁ bhavissati, abbhantarānaṁ
analyzed: niyyānam bhavissati raññam a niyyānam bhavissati
corrected: seyyathidam raññam niyyānam bhavissati raññam aniyyānam bhavissati abbhantarānam

original: seyyathidaṁ—suvuṭṭhikā bhavissati, dubbuṭṭhikā bhavissati, subhikkhaṁ bhavissati,
analyzed: bhavissati dubbuṭṭhikā bhavissati subhikkham bhavissati
corrected: seyyathidaṁ suvuṭṭhikā bhavissati dubbuṭṭhikā bhavissati subhikkham bhavissati

original: hanujappanaṁ kaṇṇajappanaṁ ādāsapañhaṁ kumārikapañhaṁ devapañhaṁ ādiccupaṭṭhānaṁ
analyzed: hanu jappanam kaṇṇa jappanam ādāsa pañham kumārika pañham deva pañham
corrected: hanu jappanam kaṇṇa jappanam ādāsa pañham kumārika pañham deva pañham ādicca upaṭṭhānam

original: seyyathidaṁ—santikammaṁ paṇidhikammaṁ bhūtakammaṁ bhūrikammaṁ vassakammaṁ vossakammaṁ
analyzed: paṇidhi kammam bhūta kammam bhūri kammam vassa kammam vossa kamma
corrected: seyyathidaṁ — santikammaṁ paṇidhi kammam bhūta kammam bhūri kammam vassa kammam vossa kamma

original: evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapādiṁ; tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo
analyzed: evam āyu pariyantaḥ saḥ tatas cutaḥ amutra udapādi eva nāmaḥ evaṅgottaḥ eva vaṇṇaḥ
corrected: evam āyu pariyantaḥ saḥ tatas cutaḥ amutra udapādi tatra āsiṁ evaṁ nāmaḥ evaṅgottaḥ evaṁ vaṇṇaḥ

original: evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapādiṁ; tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo
analyzed: evam āyu pariyantaḥ saḥ tatas cutaḥ amutra udapādi eva nāmaḥ evaṅgottaḥ eva vaṇṇaḥ
corrected: evam āyu pariyantaḥ saḥ tatas cutaḥ amutra udapādi tatra āsiṁ evaṁ nāmaḥ evaṅgottaḥ evaṁ vaṇṇaḥ

original: Seyyathidaṁ—dasapi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭāni vīsampi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭāni tiṁsampi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭāni
analyzed: savaṭṭa vivaṭṭāni vīsam pi savaṭṭa vivaṭṭāni tisam pi savaṭṭa vivaṭṭāni
corrected: seyyathidaṁ dasa pi saṁvaṭṭa vivaṭṭāni vīsam pi saṁvaṭṭa vivaṭṭāni tiṁsam pi saṁvaṭṭa vivaṭṭāni

original: Seyyathidaṁ—dasapi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭāni vīsampi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭāni tiṁsampi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭāni
analyzed: savaṭṭa vivaṭṭāni vīsam pi savaṭṭa vivaṭṭāni tisam pi savaṭṭa vivaṭṭāni
corrected: seyyathidaṁ dasa pi saṁvaṭṭa vivaṭṭāni vīsam pi saṁvaṭṭa vivaṭṭāni tiṁsam pi saṁvaṭṭa vivaṭṭāni

original: nimmitā, so nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati.
analyzed: so niccaḥ dhuvaḥ sassataḥ a vipariṇāma dhammo sassati samam tathā iva
corrected: nimmitā so nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo sassatisamaṁ tatheva ṭhassati

original: “ananto ayaṁ loko apariyanto”ti, tesampi musā.
analyzed: anantaḥ ayam lokaḥ tesam pi musā
corrected: ananto ayaṁ loko apariyanto ti tesam pi musā

original: “yathā antavā ca ayaṁ loko ananto cā”’ti.
analyzed: yathā antavā ca ayam lokaḥ ca ati
corrected: yathā antavā ca ayam loko ananto ca iti

original: ‘nevāyaṁ loko antavā, na panānanto.
analyzed: na iva ayam lokaḥ antavān na pana anantaḥ
corrected: na eva ayam lokaḥ antavān na pana anantaḥ

original: “ananto ayaṁ loko apariyanto”ti, tesampi musā.
analyzed: anantaḥ ayam lokaḥ tesam pi musā
corrected: ananto ayaṁ loko apariyanto ti tesam pi musā

original: Nevāyaṁ loko antavā, na panānanto’ti.
analyzed: na iva ayam lokaḥ antavā na pana ananta uti
corrected: na eva ayam loko antavā na pana ananto iti

original: Yesāhaṁ na sampāyeyyaṁ, so mamassa vighāto.
analyzed: na sampāyeyya saḥ mama assa vighāto
corrected: Yesāhaṁ na sampāyeyyaṁ so mama assa vighāto

original: ‘nevatthi na natthi paro loko …pe…
analyzed: na iva atthi na natthi paraḥ lokaḥ pe
corrected: na iva atthi na natthi paro loko pe

original: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā amarāvikkhepikā tattha tattha pañhaṁ
analyzed: ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā tattha tattha
corrected: ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā amarāvikkhepikā tattha tattha pañhaṁ

original: ‘Nevantavā nānantavā attā hoti ….
analyzed: na ivantavāḥ na anantavāḥ attā hoti
corrected: na eva antavā na anantavā attā hoti

original: abhivadanti dvāsaṭṭhiyā vatthūhi, tadapi tesaṁ bhavataṁ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ ajānataṁ
analyzed: abhivadanti tat api tesam bhavatam samaṇa brāhmaṇānam ajānata
corrected: abhivadanti dvāsaṭṭhiyā vatthūhi tat api tesam bhavatam samaṇa brāhmaṇānam ajānata

original: 4.4. Diṭṭhigatikādhiṭṭhānavaṭṭakathā
analyzed: diṭṭhigatika adhiṭṭhāna vaṭṭa kathā
corrected: diṭṭhigatika adhiṭṭhāna vaṭṭa kathā
